name: Haste
basic: One friendly target unit's speed is increased by three hexes per turn.
advanced: One friendly target unit's speed is increased by five hexes per turn.
expert: All friendly units' speed is increased by five hexes per turn.

name: View Air
basic: Displays the location of all artifacts on the view world screen.
advanced: Displays the location of all artifacts and heroes on the view world screen.
expert: Displays the location of all artifacts, heroes and towns on the view world screen.

name: Disguise
basic: When the casting hero is right-clicked by opponents, all of the hero's creature troops are displayed as if they were composed of the most powerful creatures in the hero's army. Troop population numbers are represented normally.
advanced: Same as Basic effect except troop population quantities are represented as '0'.
expert: Same as Advanced effect except all troops are represented as if populated by the most powerful creature in hero's longest owned town.

name: Disrupting Ray
basic: Reduces target enemy unit's defense rating by three.
advanced: Same as Basic effect, except defense rating is reduced by four.
expert: Same as Basic effect, except defense rating is reduced by five.

name: Fortune
basic: Increases Luck of target, allied troop by one.
advanced: Increases Luck of target, allied troop by two.
expert: Increases Luck of all allied troops by two.

name: Precision
basic: One friendly troop receives a +3 attack rating bonus for ranged attacks.
advanced: One friendly troop receives a +6 attack rating bonus for ranged attacks.
expert: All friendly ranged troops receive a +6 attack rating bonus for ranged attacks.

name: Protection from Air
basic: Damage from Air Magic spells is reduced by 30% for target, allied troop.
advanced: Damage from Air Magic spells is reduced by 50% for target, allied troop.
expert: Damage from Air Magic spells is reduced by 50% for all allied troops.

name: Air Shield
basic: One friendly target unit takes 25% less damage from ranged attacks.
advanced: One friendly target unit takes 50% less damage from ranged attacks.
expert: All friendly troops take 50% less damage from ranged attacks.

name: Destroy Undead
basic: All undead creature troops receive ((Power x 10) + 10) damage.
advanced: All undead creature troops receive ((Power x 10) + 20) damage.
expert: All undead creature troops receive ((Power x 10) + 50) damage.

name: Hypnotize
basic: One enemy target unit of less than ((Power x 25) + 10) Health is put under your control. Allied troops may attack hypnotized troop without fear of retaliation.
advanced: One enemy target unit of less than ((Power x 25) + 20) Health is put under your control. Allied troops may attack hypnotized troop without fear of retaliation.
expert: One enemy target unit of less than ((Power x 25) + 50) Health is put under your control. Allied troops may attack hypnotized troop without fear of retaliation.

name: Chain Lightning
basic: Lightning bolt strikes target troop for ((Power x 40) + 25) damage. Bolt then strikes closest troop for half the damage. Effect continues until 4 troops are hit.
advanced: Like Basic effect except that initial strike does ((Power x 40) + 50) damage, and bolt strikes five troops.
expert: Like Advanced effect except that initial strike does ((Power x 40) +100) damage.

name: Counterstrike
basic: One friendly target unit can retaliate against one additional attack per round.
advanced: One friendly target unit can retaliate against two additional attacks per round.
expert: All friendly troops can retaliate against two additional attacks per round.

name: Dimension Door
basic: Teleports hero to target, unoccupied, location that is visible on the Adventure Map with the hero centered. Spell may be cast twice per day and reduces the heroâ€™s movement by three tiles for each casting. If movement is reduced to zero, the spell may not be cast.
advanced: Same as Basic Effect, except the spell may be cast three times in a day.
expert: Same as Advanced Effect, except the spell may be cast four times in a day, and movement allowance is reduced by two tiles.

name: Fly
basic: Casting hero can fly over terrain obstacles to an unoccupied map location. Distance traveled may be up to 60% of normal movement.
advanced: Same as Basic effect, except the hero may fly up to 80% of normal movement.
expert: Same as Basic effect, except the hero may fly up to 100% of normal movement.

name: Magic Mirror
basic: One friendly target unit has a 20% chance of redirecting a hostile spell to a random enemy troop.
advanced: One friendly target unit has a 30% chance of redirecting a hostile spell to a random enemy troop.
expert: One friendly target unit has a 40% chance of redirecting a hostile spell to a random enemy troop.

name: Summon Air Elemental
basic: A troop containing (Power x 2) air elementals appears on the side of the casting player. Only one type of elemental can be summoned.
advanced: Same as Basic effect, except that (Power x 3) air elementals are summoned.
expert: Same as Basic effect, except that (Power x 4) air elementals are summoned.

name: Titan's Lightning Bolt
basic: Titan's lightning bolt deals exactly 600 damage to an enemy target unit. This spell is cannot be learned from a mage guild; instead, it can only be learned by the hero while they have titan's thunder artifact equipped,
